hiveArticle.title: Photography - Getting Deep into the Flower
hiveArticle.body:
A nice looking flower which has petals and it is full bloom.

![IMG_20180420_135322.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdgzFiYnQr1Xph8waUJbfDiqA1UCYdX4FDndxUY8K5LDe/IMG_20180420_135322.jpg)

<hr>

Took my camera little inside to see how beautiful the flower is from inside.

![IMG_20180420_135302.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmf3RQ4TCA7s4qu3Pq8C5zDe9MmPrsxvbD67KK3owyAdUe/IMG_20180420_135302.jpg)

<hr>

Little more deep to know from where it all has been started.

![IMG_20180420_135312.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXJhJBLeLxnpqizMm71CUT2QMHxxtYKr84KFDpXnxWNZJ/IMG_20180420_135312.jpg)

<hr>

### Camera : Nokia 6
